title: slowmode
description: Update the slowmode for a channel.
---

Update the slowmode for a channel.

## Usage

```sh
;slowmode <slowmode length | 0>
```

## Examples

```sh
# disable the slowmode in the channel you're in
;slowmode 0
# change the slowmode to 10 seconds in the chanenl you're in
;slowmode 10s
# change the slowmode to 5 minutes in #general
;slowmode 5m #general
```

## Required Permissions


:::note
Learn more about permissions in [Discord's FAQ](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206029707-Setting-Up-Permissions-FAQ).
:::

- Manage Channels
